unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Confidence Level and $1$-sided Significance Testing
question_text: A one sample $t$ -test for was used to conduct a test of the null hypotheses: $${ H }_{ 0 }:\mu =28$$ $${ H }_{ a }:\mu <28$$ The $p$ -value was $0.006$ . A  confidence interval for * $\mu$ * is to be constructed. Of the following, which is the largest level of confidence for which the confidence interval will NOT contain $28$ ?
